title: Dutch Coffee Shop
description: Nine years ago, William Demsey's brother Jimmy faked his own death and ran away from a crime he didn't commit. Now 18 years old, William decides to head to Amsterdam-the belly of the beast-to find his brother and to find answers he has sought since he disappeared. On this journey, William encounters mob bosses, weed-tenders, and prostitutes, all looking for a man called "Hunt". Learning that Jimmy and "Hunt" are one and the same propels William to make a choice that will determine his family's fate, and his own. Dutch Coffee Shop is a dark story of redemption, cutting to the core of basic human choice.
author: Jay Scully
